Notes

All copies black vinyl with an etched B side. Includes lyrics sheet, A3 poster and download card. Recorded in Boulder, Colorado, July 2013. Bass recorded at The Cave Studios, Australia throughout 2013 & 2014. Mixed and mastered at Subterranean Watchtower Studios February & March 2015. Original artwork by Bruce Pennington © 1973.
